title: Bridgeport News: 2 Women Shot
content: 9:30pm-ish–#Bridgeport Connecticut–Witnesses said they heard 5 shot around 9:30 Saturday night and two women are in critical condition. Chief Perez said he believes it was a robbery on the quite Anson Street which is located behind St. Vincent’s Hospital. One woman was shot in the chest and the other in the back. Radio reports said the suspects are young, in their late teens or early twenties. This is breaking news and information can change. If I get any updates I’ll let you know on DoingItLocal.com
